attributes.action: Scrap the worthless ASBO, which has become a 'badge of Honour' amongst hooligans.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: ASBOs are now seen as a badge of honour amonst those out to cause social disorder. Far from punishing, ASBOs are now encouraging hooligan behaviour. The government must support the police and the courts and provide the power to protect the law abiding citizen with effective custodial sentences for violent and disruptive social disorder.
